name: TEETH_REVIEWED
description: This table contains information about when a patient's teeth were first reviewed.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: TEETH_REV_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the patient's teeth were first reviewed during the Add / Remove Teeth functionality in the Tooth Chart activity.

columns.name: TEETH_REV_USER
columns.description: The user who first reviewed the patient's teeth using the Add/Remove Teeth functionality from within the Tooth Chart activity.

columns.name: TEETH_REV_USER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
